response.overview: A vegan and a hunter go on a date. Tshidi is an award-winning artist and Jan is a PH abbreviation for "professional hunter". Tshidi does not know what a PH is and she is too shy to ask, but the Tinder dates go smoothly and they order an Uber. They arrive at Jan's Stellenbosch home. The lights are turned on and a wall full of hunting trophies is revealed. Is it a dream or a nightmare? Who is the hunter and who is the prey? The Vegan and the Hunter is a dark comedy about what happens when tastes radically differ - a wrong-com that investigates the trauma of generations.
response.title: Die Vegan en die Jagter
